code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{fetchWeatherData}from'../api';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WeatherDetails=_ref=>{let{city}=_ref;const unit=useSelector(state=>state.unit);const[weather,setWeather]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const getWeather=async()=>{const data=await fetchWeatherData(city,unit);setWeather(data);};getWeather();},[city,unit]);if(!weather)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"\u0141adowanie pogody..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Pogoda w ",city]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Temperatura: ",weather.list[0].main.temp,"\xB0C"]})]});};export default WeatherDetails;
